name: CollarSwap
description: CollarSwap is a tax-free token that belongs to the community and operates on the Ethereum Chain via ShibaSwap. Its mission is to establish an equitable environment and grant equal access to decentralized finance (DeFi) opportunities for all users. To achieve this objective, CollarSwap will build a trustworthy decentralized exchange (DEX) that prioritizes transparency and community participation while remaining accessible to all. Through $COLLAR, traders can effortlessly engage in cryptocurrency trades using our DEXâ€™s user-friendly interface. Additionally, users will have the chance to earn passive income through staking and other methods. $COLLAR is designed with you in mind, and its operation and utilization will be managed by you.
